subject: Gerry Weber Open (Tennis)
Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: After one of the slowest starts to a season in his career, Roger Federer came from a set down to beat Mikhail Youzhny in the Gerry Weber Open, a Wimbledon tuneup event.
snippet: After one of the slowest starts to a season in his career, Roger Federer came from a set down to beat Mikhail Youzhny in the Gerry Weber Open, a Wimbledon tuneup event.
